summary: Changes the detail on the Morokei Dragon mask a little.
descriptionHtml:
Just a little change for the mask I didn\'t like the swirly pattern so I decided to put this on, In my opinion it makes it a little more fitting for the game!

Unfortunately if you\'re wearing the archmage robes the mask doesn\'t show but I am working on a fix for that and i\'ll get it out as soon as I can.
 
Install:
Download > Extract the data in the rar file to your skyrim \"data\" folder

The data folder is located in:  [...]\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Hope you enjoy!
author: Dalerayner1
